AHKExePath.label: AutoHotkey Executable Path
AHKExePath.tooltip: Enter the local path to the AutoHotkey executable. This is necessary if using use the AutoHotkey reward type and arguments need to be passed to script.

TwitchClientId.label: Twitch Client Id
TwitchClientId.tooltip: Enter the client id of your application at dev.twitch.com. See readme for more information.

TwitchClientSecret.label: Twitch Client Secret
TwitchClientSecret.tooltip: Enter the client secret of your application at dev.twitch.com. See readme for more information.

TwitchRedirectUrl.label: Twitch Auth Redirect URL
TwitchRedirectUrl.tooltip: This is where you will be redirected after getting an auth code. This should match the redirect url in dev.twitch application settings.

TwitchAuthCode.label: Twitch Auth Code
TwitchAuthCode.tooltip: Enter an Auth Code that allows the bot to read channel point redemptions on the channel being watched.

btnGetToken.label: Get Token
btnGetToken.tooltip: Generate an Auth Code for the watched twitch account with permissions to read channel point redemptions.

btnDeleteSavedTokens.label: Delete Saved Tokens
btnDeleteSavedTokens.tooltip: Clear out saved tokens so that a new Authorization Code can be used.

btnRefreshTokens.label: Refresh Saved Tokens
btnRefreshTokens.tooltip: Manually trigger a refresh of access token using refresh token..

RewardName1.label: Title of Twitch Reward
RewardName1.tooltip: Specify the name of the Twitch Reward that will trigger this event when detected.

RewardType1.label: Reward Type
RewardType1.tooltip: Select the type of reward. Then match the associated number with the below inputs that can be used.

RewardActivationType1.label: Activation Point
RewardActivationType1.tooltip: Set whether the reward should be triggered immediately on reward redemption by viewer, or when the reward is accepted/rejected from the reward queue. Note: twitch currently doesn't return a way to distinguish between Accept or Reject so Reject will still trigger the reward.

AlertSFXPath1.label: 1) Alert Path to SFX File
AlertSFXPath1.tooltip: Specify the path to the SFX effect to trigger.

AlertSFXVolume1.label: 1) Alert SFX Volume
AlertSFXVolume1.tooltip: Specify the volume to the SFX effect to trigger.

AlertSFXDelay1.label: 1) Alert SFX Delay in Seconds
AlertSFXDelay1.tooltip: Specify the number of seconds to wait before attempting to play next SFX in queue after starting to play this SFX.

CountdownTimerLength1.label: 2) Time in Seconds to Add to Countdown
CountdownTimerLength1.tooltip: Set the amount of time in seconds to add to the timer.

ResetCommand1.label: 2) Command Name for Resetting Countdown
ResetCommand1.tooltip: Set the command name that can be used by moderator+ to reset timer to closest countdown multiple or by a specific amount of seconds.

RedeemedSFXPath1.label: 2) Path to SFX at Redemption File
RedeemedSFXPath1.tooltip: Specify the path to the SFX effect to trigger immediately at reward redemption.

RedeemedSFXVolume1.label: 2) SFX at Redemption Volume
RedeemedSFXVolume1.tooltip: Specify the volume to the SFX effect to trigger immediately at reward redemption.

RedeemedSFXDelay1.label: 2) SFX at Redemption Delay in Seconds
RedeemedSFXDelay1.tooltip: Specify the number of seconds to wait before attempting to play next SFX in queue after starting to play this SFX.

FinishedSFXPath1.label: 2) Path to SFX at Finish File
FinishedSFXPath1.tooltip: Specify the path to the SFX effect to trigger at the end of the countdown.

FinishedSFXVolume1.label: 2) SFX at Finish Volume
FinishedSFXVolume1.tooltip: Specify the volume to the SFX effect to trigger at the end of the countdown.

TimeoutFixedUser1.label: 3) Fixed Username to Timeout
TimeoutFixedUser1.tooltip: If timeout type is set to Fixed this will be the user that is timed out.

TimeoutDuration1.label: 3) Timeout Duration
TimeoutDuration1.tooltip: Specify the number of seconds to timeout user.

UseRewardCost1.label: 4) Use Reward Amount
UseRewardCost1.tooltip: If set to true it will assign currency to user equal to reward cost.

CurrencyAmount1.label: 4) Currency Amount
CurrencyAmount1.tooltip: Set the amount of currency to give to user on redemption.

AHKPath1.label: 5) Path to AutoHotkey script
AHKPath1.tooltip: Specify the path to the AutoHotKey script to trigger.

AHKArguments1.label: 5) Arguments to Pass to AutoHotkey Script
AHKArguments1.tooltip: Enter a comma separated list of arguments to pass to script. {username}, {message}, {rewardtitle}, {rewardcost}, {timestamp} can be used to get user and reward info to pass into script.

AHKDelay1.label: 5) AutoHotkey Delay in Seconds
AHKDelay1.tooltip: Specify the number of seconds to wait before attempting to process next reward.
